Package com.stl.skipthelibrary.Activities

This package contains all of our activities

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBooksActivity
    This activity is used to add a book.
    BorrowersBooksActivity
    This activity is where borrowers can see and filter all of the books they are interested in.
    LoginActivity
    Allows user's to log in both automatically and manually, also allows users to create a new account
    MapBoxActivity
    This activity allows a user to set a location on a map.
    MyBooksActivity
    Display all of the books a user has and allow the user to filter them by book status
    NotificationActivity
    The notification activity.
    ProfileActivity
    Displays a user's profile, can display either the current user's profile or the profile of another user
    ScannerActivity
    The scanner activity launches the scanner and returns the ISBN of the scanned barcode
    SearchActivity
    This activity is where borrowers can filterSearchedBooks for all available books they can request.
    SignUpActivity
    This activity allows user's to register for a new account
    ViewBookActivity
    This activity allows both both borrowers and owners to view books.

Package com.stl.skipthelibrary.Activities Description

This package contains all of our activities
Since:
1.0
